subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: After their mast came crashing down, forcing them to a remote island, the Puma team members are hoping to start the second leg of the Volvo Ocean Race, from Cape Town to Abu Dhabi, on Sunday.
snippet: After their mast came crashing down, forcing them to a remote island, the Puma team members are hoping to start the second leg of the Volvo Ocean Race, from Cape Town to Abu Dhabi, on Sunday.
